summary_gpt: BLS International Services Limited has canceled its scheduled investor/analyst meet with Muddy Waters Asia due to business exigencies, as per SEBI regulations. The cancellation was announced through the stock exchanges and a corporate update.

BLS International Services Limited has scheduled a one-on-one investor/analyst meeting with Muddy Waters Asia on May 6, 2025, to discuss the company's financial and operational performance, with no unpublished price-sensitive information to be shared. The company has disclosed this event in compliance with SEBI regulations, and the details are available on their website.
